body:
Hey everyone!
My name is DaFiperz or Dale. I'm 16 years old and I live in Australia.
I can be found generally on the nebula gamemode, but occasionally in other ones.
I used to be a frequent player on the server until my computer broke and I wasn't able to play for a long time :(
But thankfully, my pc is now fully functional and I can play again :D
Hope to see you all around :)
DaFiperz

title: Introduction: DaFiperz

replies.body: Hey! Welcome (back) to the forums! Feel free to say hi whenever you see me online and on here :)
